title: Lego (+ Rokenbok) Design Competition
description: Me and a close friend entered a lego design contest where we built a city scape out of lego and rokenbok pieces. It had a Rockenblock monorail!

title: My First Invention: The Butter-Sauna
description: During covid I enrolled in Mark Rober's invention curriculum where I created a machine that softens butter to room temperature in 4% of the time it normally takes for making cookies.

title: Custom 3D Printed Mechanisms
description: Collection of functional mechanical parts and artistic pieces, ranging from robot components to sculptures, exploring form and function.

title: Music Composition Portfolio
description: Original musical compositions blending electronic and organic sounds across different genres and moods.

title: FRC Practice Robot Systems
description: Prototyping and testing platform for mechanism validation and driver practice, enabling parallel development with competition robot.

title: Automated Prop Controllers
description: Network of Arduino-based controllers orchestrating complex, multi-prop sequences in haunted house with wireless synchronization.

title: CAD Model Library
description: Comprehensive library of parametric CAD models for common FRC mechanisms, enabling rapid design iteration and team knowledge sharing.

title: 1729 Team Inconcievable Website
description: I designed and developed the website for FRC Team 1729 Inconceivable, showcasing our teamâ€™s achievements, projects, and values.
